articles.title: Xbox Game Pass Adds Ninja Gaiden 4 in October 2025 Wave 2
articles.excerpt: Xbox has announced the second wave of games for its Game Pass subscription service, featuring the day-one release of the highly anticipated action title Ninja Gaiden 4.
articles.author: Xbox Wire Staff
articles.fullContent:
Ninja Gaiden 4 Headlines Second Wave of Xbox Game Pass Titles for October

Microsoft has officially revealed the next slate of games arriving on its Xbox Game Pass service for console, PC, and cloud gaming. The announcement confirms that the highly anticipated sequel, Ninja Gaiden 4, will be available on day one of its release, October 21, 2025. This addition is part of a varied lineup designed to cater to a wide range of players, from action enthusiasts to fans of classic role-playing games.

What's Coming to Game Pass

The October update continues to build on the Game Pass value proposition, which recently saw a structural revision to its subscription tiers. Alongside Ninja Gaiden 4, subscribers will gain access to several other notable titles. PC players can look forward to the arrival of Baldur's Gate & Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Editions on October 9, bringing two classic RPGs to the platform. Other additions include the day-one release of Keeper and the action game Evil West.

"The definitive ninja action-adventure franchise returns with NINJA GAIDEN 4! Embark on a cutting-edge adventure where legacy meets innovation in a high-octane blend of style and no-holds-barred combat." - Xbox Official Statement

Broader Impact for Subscribers

This announcement comes after Microsoft adjusted its Game Pass subscription model, introducing Essential and Premium tiers to replace the former Core and Standard plans. The inclusion of a major third-party title like Ninja Gaiden 4 on its release day underscores Microsofts strategy to make the service indispensable for gamers. The game, co-developed by Team Ninja and PlatinumGames, is set to be a significant release for the action-adventure genre.

Key Takeaways

  • Ninja Gaiden 4: Arriving on Game Pass for console, PC, and cloud on its release date, October 21, 2025.
  • Classic RPGs for PC: Baldur's Gate and its sequel, in their enhanced editions, will be available for PC subscribers from October 9.
  • Titles Leaving: Subscribers should note that Cocoon, Core Keeper, and Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed will leave the service on October 15.
  • Subscription Tiers: The new games will be available across the recently updated Game Pass tiers, including Premium and Ultimate.

articles.title: Casual Computer Support Role with Full Training
articles.excerpt: Delta Computers in Applecross is seeking a casual technician to support its technology fleet, offering comprehensive on-the-job training.
articles.author: Delta Computers
articles.fullContent:
Role Overview

Delta Computers, a technology services provider in Applecross, has an opening for a Casual Computer Support technician. This entry-level position is ideal for individuals looking to start a career in IT, as the company provides full on-the-job training to manage and maintain a diverse fleet of approximately 4,000 technology items. The role focuses on providing hands-on technical support and ensuring operational stability across the company's managed assets.

Key Responsibilities

  • Performing diagnostics, troubleshooting, and repairs on desktops and notebooks.
  • Conducting parts replacement, system upgrades, and new deployments.
  • Responding to user support tickets in a timely manner to meet service level agreements.
  • Identifying and escalating potential issues that could impact end-user experience.

Required Qualifications

  • Education: High School Diploma or equivalent is required.
  • Experience: No formal experience is necessary as full training is provided. Previous customer service or technical support experience is a plus.
  • Technical Skills: A basic understanding of Windows operating systems is beneficial. An A+ certification or equivalent skill set would be highly regarded.
  • Soft Skills: Strong client service and communication skills, with a proactive approach to problem-solving.

What We Offer

  • A comprehensive, hands-on training programme.
  • A supportive team environment.
  • Flexible casual work arrangement.
  • Opportunity to build a career in the IT support industry.

üìç Location: Applecross, Perth (On-site)

Application Instructions

To apply for this position, please visit the source URL and follow the application instructions provided. Be prepared to submit a current resume outlining your interest and any relevant skills. Applications will be reviewed as they are received.

Key Points

  • Role: Casual Computer Support Technician.
  • Key Requirement: Eagerness to learn; no prior IT experience needed.
  • Work Arrangement: On-site in Applecross, Perth.
  • Benefit: Full on-the-job training provided.

videos.title: A Dynastic History of The Roman Empire
videos.excerpt: A deep dive into the foundational dynasties of the Roman Empire, from the Julio-Claudians to the Nerva-Antonine dynasty.
